Uses of Class
Presentation.Command

  • Packages that use Command 
    Package Description
    Presentation  

    • Uses of Command in Presentation

      Subclasses of Command in Presentation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CMD_Admin
      Command for handling access to AdminPage
      class  CMD_Balance
      Command for handling userBalance, the application currency
      class  CMD_Checkout 
      class  CMD_Create_User_Error
      Command for forwarding to the CreateError.jsp page when the user enters wrong information in the creation of their user.
      class  CMD_Customer
      Command for handling access to Customer Page
      class  CMD_CustomerInvoiceDetails
      Command for handling access to the Invoice Details page
      class  CMD_Login
      Handles login/registration from Login.jsp using the data sent with POST
      class  CMD_Logout 
      class  CMD_Shop
      Command for handling the Shop page.
      class  CMD_ShoppingCart
      Command for forwarding to the ShoppingCart.jsp
      class  CMD_Unknown
      Command for handling and showing application errors
      class  CMD_Unknown_Login
      Command for forwarding to the LoginError.jsp page when the user enters wrong information while loggin in.
      Methods in Presentation that return Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Command Command.from(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Creates the specific command requested from the pathinfo and returns it
